name: 2D Shooter - Improved!
description:
A 2D Action Shooter, new and improved! 

1) Add multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in your game. Each level provides incremental challenge and introduces players to new enemies and mechanics before testing their mettle in the final level!

2) Create a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level. Level 5 is the final level, combining all of what the player has learned from the previous levels!

3)Add new enemies with their own behavior. The Space Station spawns chaser enemies in increments, but they can be shot down with focused fire!

Created by Dylan Troyer
